      • swipe

        public MacacaClient swipe(int startX,
                          int startY,
                          int endX,
                          int endY,
                          int duration)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Swipe on the touch screen using finger motion events.
        Parameters:
        startX - The X coordinate to position the window at, relative to the upper left corner of the screen
        startY - The Y coordinate to position the window at, relative to the upper left corner of the screen
        endX - The X coordinate to position the window at, relative to the upper left corner of the screen
        endY - The Y coordinate to position the window at, relative to the upper left corner of the screen
        duration - The duration of the swipe operation
        Returns:
        The currently instance of MacacaClient
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
